response: You can submit your documents online or by any kind of post. Our email is: docs@pstu.ru. Our address is Perm, Russia.
To apply you need following documents: passport, diploma, 2 photos, medical ref. and exam certificate.
You can find list of required documents on our website. When you collect everythin go to main building to apply or send it by post or email.
You can apply with your documents every working day from 9 to 5 till 1 of August.
To collect the docs you have to check the list on our website, review everything that you have and apply any way you want
Oh, i see. To resolve this problem I have to connect you with the operator. Here is the phone number: 2-123-123
